scripts.test:coverage: dotnet test src/src.sln --collect:"XPlat Code Coverage" --settings src/coverlet.runsettings
scripts.test:ci: npm run remove:testfolder && npm run test:coverage && reportgenerator "-reports:TestResults\**\coverage.cobertura.xml" "-targetdir:TestResults\report" -reporttypes:Html
scripts.up: npm run build -- -o dist && docker build . --tag clean-dotnet --no-cache && docker-compose up -d
